column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------ Phnom Penh Municipal Administration has issued a notification on transporting passengers over the Pchum Ben Festival holiday:------1. Companies and the owners of vehicles carrying passengers are asked to keep prices unchanged.------2. Let the company owners and the owners of  vehicles instruct staff and drivers not to overload their passengers and to obey the traffic rules.------3. Citizens should not overload vehicles or sit on the roof of a taxi to avoid accidents.
